Name: Modding API
Author: Damocles
Description: An API that is required for almost all other mods and allows for custom skins

Name: Randomizer
Author: Damocles
Description: A randomizer mod that can shuffle items, enemies, and doors

Name: Rando Map
Author: Damocles
Description: An in-game map tracker for the Blasphemous Randomizer

Name: Multiworld
Author: Damocles
Description: A multiworld client that allows the randomizer to connect to Archipelago

Name: PrieWarp
Author: BadMagic
Description: A mod which allows easily warping between unlocked Prie Dieus with mnemonic hotkeys.

Name: Multiplayer
Author: Damocles
Description: A multiplayer mod that allows you to play Blasphemous cooperatively or against other people

Name: Boots of Pleading
Author: Damocles
Description: Adds a new relic called the 'Boots of Pleading' that allows you to survive falling in spikes

Name: Double Jump
Author: Damocles
Description: Adds a new relic called the 'Purified Hand of the Nun' that allows you to double jump

Name: Random Prayer
Author: Damocles
Description: Adds a new penitence that randomizes which prayer is used each time you attempt to cast one

Name: Debug Mod
Author: Damocles
Description: Enables the hitbox viewer and other features useful for testing and development
